attributes.action: Ban all Bonus payments immediately in financial institutions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As tax payers who now have shares in many banks and financial institutions we demand that no bonus payments shall be made to any staff members of these institutions, as tax payers we cannot afford to be so generous as to continually reward failure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
